review:
I have consulted the doctor for anxiety and other questions related to Covid. 
He is super patient, listening to the issues keenly , asks a lot of questions to understand what exactly the patient is going through and then diagnose the situation. 
I wish if every doctor could be that patient and try to give time to his patients.
I would totally recommend him to others. 
Thank you Dr.Rohan

I contacted Dr. Rohan to clear some doubts regarding Covid. He was extremely patient, listened to my queries and cleared the doubts really well. I would definitely reach him out again and recommend him to my family and friends. Thanks a lot doctor!
